skate_surfing_description: Imagine the wind rushing past you as you carve your way through the streets. Feel the adrenaline pumping as you perform tricks you've only dreamed of. That's the magic of skate-surfing, and we want you to experience it.
home_description: Imagine the wind blowing past you as you ride your way outside. Feel the adrenaline pumping while doing tricks you've only dreamed of. We want you to experience it.
about_me_description: I'm Itay Dangour, a 25-year-old surfskate instructor living in Tel Aviv. With a decade of experience in surfing and three years of dedicated surf skating, I'm well-versed in both worlds. Currently, I'm pursuing a degree in Business Administration and Entrepreneurship. My specialty lies in instructing straight riding and enhancing your surfing and riding abilities. Over the years, I've successfully trained numerous complete beginners. Whether your aim is to master advanced tricks or simply enjoy the thrill of surf skating, my comprehensive curriculum is designed to ensure your success.
bring: Just yourself and comfortable clothing. All other equipment will be provided.
duration: Each session lasts approximately one hour.
forBeginners: Absolutely, beginners are more than welcome!
groupDiscount: Yes, we offer discounts for groups of 3 or more.
location: Where is the session taking place?
cancellationPolicy: You can cancel up to 24 hours before the session for a full refund.
